org.springframework.cloud.stream.aggregate

Interface AggregateApplication

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggregateApplicationBuilder

    public interface AggregateApplication
    Handle to an aggregate application, providing access to the underlying components of the aggregate (e.g. bindable instances).
    Author:
    Marius Bogoevici

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T getBinding(Class<T> bindableType, String namespace)
      Retrieves the bindable proxy instance (e.g.

    • Method Detail

      • getBinding

        <T> T getBinding(Class<T> bindableType,
                 String namespace)
        Retrieves the bindable proxy instance (e.g. Processor, Source, Sink or custom interface) from the given namespace.
        Type Parameters:
        T - parameterized bindable type
        Parameters:
        bindableType - the bindable type
        namespace - the namespace
